description:
Hinamori Amu is a 5th grader attending Seiya Academy. Thought to be a cool, tough person by all, deep down she is a shy girl who wishes for the courage to express her true feelings. These wishes gave birth to Guardian Characters, tiny expressions of her would-be self.
She has a crush on Hotori Tadase, and confesses, thanks to one of here Guardian Characters, Ran, but after his rejection, develops interests in several other boys as well as time goes on.
name: Hinamori Amu
